alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; McPherson; Rice; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western McPherson, southwestern Lincoln, eastern Rice, Ellsworth, Russell and northeastern Barton Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Russell to near Inman. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Lyons, Ellsworth, Moundridge, Inman, Wilson, Kanopolis, Marquette, Little River, Holyrood, Lucas, Bushton, Sylvan Grove, Geneseo, Luray, Dorrance, Lorraine, Windom, Bunker Hill and Paradise. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 56 and 57. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 190 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; McPherson; Rice; Russell
